title: Breakingviews TV: Goldman’s CEO
text:
Breakingviews TV: Goldman’s CEO Monday, March 12, 2018 - 03:31 
John Foley and Antony Currie explain why investment banker David Solomon is the favorite to take over from Lloyd Blankfein – and what his elevation to the top says about the problems Goldman has had with its trading division.   
John Foley and Antony Currie explain why investment banker David Solomon is the favorite to take over from Lloyd Blankfein – and what his elevation to the top says about the problems Goldman has had with its trading division.  //reut.rs/2paxzlx
